definition: long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: China is a wehasternativehy country with an extended history.
sentences.chinese: 中國是一個具有悠遠歷史的國度。

sentences.english: The style of natural guileless, show a long time ago agrestic breath.
sentences.chinese: 自然樸實的格調，顯示出悠遠的鄉土氣息。

sentences.english: She recalled the events of the distant past.
The soccer dance had a long history and profound influence.
sentences.chinese: 巫舞歷史悠遠，影響深廣。

sentences.english: Chen Wei's mind and works are quiet and remote.
sentences.chinese: 陳蔚的心性和作品安靜而悠遠。

sentences.english: The real difficulties and suffering bring the aesthetic mirage of distant era.
sentences.chinese: 現實的困難與不幸給我們帶來了悠遠時代的審美幻象。

sentences.english: The tannin extract perfectly matches the subtle acidity, helping preserve the memory of this authentic Cabernet Sauvignon long after tasting it.
sentences.chinese: 單寧提取物完美的融合了微酸，品嚐後能回香悠遠。

sentences.english: The elegance of the ancient music condenses into the deep national complex;
sentences.chinese: 詩文古樂的馨雅緻韻，凝結成鏗鏘悠遠的民族情節。

sentences.english: In addition it helps to deliver the Dizi sound far away.
sentences.chinese: 使笛子的聲音更加悠遠。

sentences.english: A touch of acidity and remarkable length in the mouth make a consistently delightful finish.
sentences.chinese: 淡淡的果酸及精緻的餘韻令其回味頗爲悠遠，怡人。

definition: pleasant lingering effect/memorable stylishness/haunting tune/aftertaste (of a good wine etc)
to blend into one another/to blend together well
thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
